import React from "react"; import {Tag} from "antd"; import { useRedirectToItem } from 'util/navigation'; const ClaimItem = ({data}) => { const {image, title, amount, date} = data; const redirectToItem = useRedirectToItem(); return (
Open

{title}

{amount}
2024-09-09 - 2025-09-09

{date}

redirectToItem(1,'claim')}>View Claim

); } export default ClaimItem;
